title: A Literal Version of Fleetwood Mac's "Landslide"
description: The song "Landslide" by Fleetwood Mac was recorded in 1975 but wasn't released as a single until 1997 (a live version). Still, it became a classic for its wistful, melancholy melody and poetic lyrics. Stevie Nicks wrote the song as she contemplated her future…
content: The song "Landslide" by Fleetwood Mac was recorded in 1975 but wasn't released as a single until 1997 (a live version). Still, it became a classic for its wistful, melancholy melody and poetic lyrics… [+705 chars]
de: Eine wörtliche Version von Fleetwood Macs „Landslide“. Der Song „Landslide“ von Fleetwood Mac wurde 1975 aufgenommen, aber erst 1997 als Single veröffentlicht (eine Live-Version). Dennoch wurde es wegen seiner wehmütigen, melancholischen Melodie und seinen poetischen Texten zu einem Klassiker. Stevie Nicks schrieb das Lied, während sie über ihre Zukunft nachdachte …
en: A Literal Version of Fleetwood Mac's "Landslide". The song "Landslide" by Fleetwood Mac was recorded in 1975 but wasn't released as a single until 1997 (a live version). Still, it became a classic for its wistful, melancholy melody and poetic lyrics. Stevie Nicks wrote the song as she contemplated her future…
la: Versio literalis Fleetwood Mac's Landslide. Carmen "Landslide" a Fleetwood Mac anno 1975 conscriptum est, sed non solum unum usque ad 1997 dimissum est (versio viva). Nihilominus classica facta est ad eius melodiam et musicam et ad musicam melancholiam. Stevie Nicks scripsit canticum ut contemplaretur eam futuram…

title: Fleetwood Mac’s Landslide… But It’s About Landslides
description: Originally, Fleetwood Mac’s Landslide was a soft, melancholy metaphor written by Stevie Nicks about love, change, and her future with Lindsey Buckingham, not flying rocks and natural disasters. Now There I Ruined It creator Dustin Ballard teamed up with Grief…
content: Originally, Fleetwood Mac’s Landslide was a soft, melancholy metaphor written by Stevie Nicks about love, change, and her future with Lindsey Buckingham, not flying rocks and natural disasters. Now T… [+128 chars]
de: Der Erdrutsch von Fleetwood Mac … aber es geht um Erdrutsche. Ursprünglich war „Landslide“ von Fleetwood Mac eine sanfte, melancholische Metapher von Stevie Nicks über Liebe, Veränderung und ihre Zukunft mit Lindsey Buckingham, nicht über fliegende Steine ​​und Naturkatastrophen. „Now There I Ruined It“-Schöpfer Dustin Ballard hat sich mit Grief zusammengetan…
en: Fleetwood Mac’s Landslide… But It’s About Landslides. Originally, Fleetwood Mac’s Landslide was a soft, melancholy metaphor written by Stevie Nicks about love, change, and her future with Lindsey Buckingham, not flying rocks and natural disasters. Now There I Ruined It creator Dustin Ballard teamed up with Grief…
la: Fleetwood Mac's Landslide… Sed suus de Landslides. Primitus, Fleetwood Mac Landslides mollis, melancholia fuit metaphora a Stevie Nicks scripta de amore, mutatione, et futura apud Lindsey Buckingham, non saxa et clades naturales volans. Nunc ibi perii Creator Dustin Ballard cum Luctu teamed…

title: Greenland’s melting ice and landslide-prone fjords make the oil and minerals Trump is eyeing dangerous to extract
description: Melting ice, thawing permafrost and crumbling fjord walls are just a few of the risks climate change poses for those living and working in Greenland.
content: Since Donald Trump regained the U.S. presidency, he has talked about taking over Greenland. He has insisted that the U.S. will control the island, currently an autonomous territory of Denmark, and th… [+8138 chars]
de: Das schmelzende Eis Grönlands und die erdrutschgefährdeten Fjorde machen die Förderung von Öl und Mineralien, die Trump anstrebt, gefährlich. Schmelzendes Eis, auftauender Permafrost und bröckelnde Fjordmauern sind nur einige der Risiken, die der Klimawandel für die Menschen mit sich bringt, die in Grönland leben und arbeiten.
en: Greenland’s melting ice and landslide-prone fjords make the oil and minerals Trump is eyeing dangerous to extract. Melting ice, thawing permafrost and crumbling fjord walls are just a few of the risks climate change poses for those living and working in Greenland.
la: Groenlandiae glaciem liquefactionem et fjords landli-proni faciunt, oleum et mineralia Trump periculosum extractum inspicit. Glacies liquescens, tabidaque permafrost et parietum putridum fjord sunt pauci periculorum mutationis climatis illis in Groenlandia viventibus et operantibus.

title: Deadly mine landslide case set for key hearing
description: A court is set to convene on Jan. 6 for the fifth hearing in the criminal case regarding a 2024 landslide at a gold mine that killed nine workers in the eastern city of Erzincan's İliç district.
content:
ERZNCAN
A court is set to convene on Jan. 6 for the fifth hearing in the criminal case regarding a 2024 landslide at a gold mine that killed nine workers in the eastern city of Erzincan's liç distri… [+1452 chars]
de: Der Fall eines tödlichen Erdrutschs in einer Mine steht vor einer wichtigen Anhörung. Am 6. Januar soll ein Gericht zur fünften Anhörung im Strafverfahren zu einem Erdrutsch in einer Goldmine im Jahr 2024 zusammentreten, bei dem neun Arbeiter im Bezirk İliç der östlichen Stadt Erzincan ums Leben kamen.
en: Deadly mine landslide case set for key hearing. A court is set to convene on Jan. 6 for the fifth hearing in the criminal case regarding a 2024 landslide at a gold mine that killed nine workers in the eastern city of Erzincan's İliç district.
la: Funesta mea ruina casus clavis auditus est. Iudicium convocandum constituitur die 6 mensis Ianuarii pro quinta audientia in causa criminali de 2024 in ruina auri mei qui novem operarios in urbe orientali Erzincan's İliç occiderunt.

title: Għajn Dwieli tunnel closed after rocks fall due to bad weather
description: Emergency works to start Friday morning as drivers are urged to avoid the tunnel
content:
Updated 8.46pm
The Gajn Dwieli tunnel leading into Cospicua will remain closed throughout Friday for emergency works after some rocks fell beneath the underpass "due to bad weather" on Thursday afte… [+2016 chars]

en: Għajn Dwieli tunnel closed after rocks fall due to bad weather. Emergency works to start Friday morning as drivers are urged to avoid the tunnel
la: Għajn Dwieli cuniculus clausus post saxa ob tempestatibus decidit. Subitis opera incipere Veneris mane sicut aurigae hortantur ad evitandum cuniculum

title: Two rockfall events sent boulders crashing onto popular B.C. hiking trail
description: A geohazard assessment determined the first slide took place on Dec. 26 and a second slide on Dec. 29. The assessment found that several large rocks, approximately three to four metres in diameter, came crashing down onto the Stawamus Chief Trail in Squamish,…
content:
A popular hiking trail in Squamish, B.C., remains closed after officials have now determined two separate rockfall events damaged the park. 
B.C. Parks closed the Stawamus Chief main trail on Dec. 2… [+2399 chars]
de: Bei zwei Steinschlägen stürzten Felsbrocken auf das beliebte B.C.-Gebiet. Wanderweg. Eine Gefährdungsbeurteilung ergab, dass die erste Rutsche am 26. Dezember und die zweite am 29. Dezember stattfand. Die Untersuchung ergab, dass mehrere große Steine ​​mit einem Durchmesser von etwa drei bis vier Metern auf den Stawamus Chief Trail in Squamish stürzten.
en: Two rockfall events sent boulders crashing onto popular B.C. hiking trail. A geohazard assessment determined the first slide took place on Dec. 26 and a second slide on Dec. 29. The assessment found that several large rocks, approximately three to four metres in diameter, came crashing down onto the Stawamus Chief Trail in Squamish,…
la: Duae res scopuli missi saxa fragores in populares B.C. garrientes trahens. A taxatio geohazard definita primum lapsus fiebat die 26 Dec. et secunda lapsus die 29 Decembris. Taxatio invenit complures magnas petras, circiter tria ad quattuor metra in diametro, in Stawamus dux Trail in Squamish ruit.

title: 2027: PDP vows to oust APC in Kogi
description:
The PDP Kogi State Chairman declares readiness to oust the ruling APC in the 2027 election, vowing a landslide victory and a return to prosperity.

Read More: https://punchng.com/2027-pdp-vows-to-oust-apc-in-kogi/
content:
The Chairman of the Kogi State Peoples Democratic Party, Muhammed Gambo, has declared his partys readiness to take over Lugard House in the 2027 elections.
In a statement issued on Friday in Lokoja,… [+1908 chars]
de:
2027: PDP verspricht, APC in Kogi zu verdrängen. Der PDP-Staatsvorsitzende Kogi erklärt seine Bereitschaft, die regierende APC bei den Wahlen 2027 zu verdrängen, und verspricht einen Erdrutschsieg und eine Rückkehr zum Wohlstand.

Lesen Sie mehr: https://punchng.com/2027-pdp-vows-to-oust-apc-in-kogi/
en:
2027: PDP vows to oust APC in Kogi. The PDP Kogi State Chairman declares readiness to oust the ruling APC in the 2027 election, vowing a landslide victory and a return to prosperity.

Read More: https://punchng.com/2027-pdp-vows-to-oust-apc-in-kogi/
la:
2027: PDP vota evitanda APC in Kogi. Praeses rei publicae PDP Kogi promptum declarat ad regimen APC in 2027 electione expugnandum, vovens ruinam victoriam et reditum ad prosperitatem.

Lege More: https://punchng.com/2027-pdp-vows-to-oust-apc-in-kogi/

title: Rescuers race to find dozens missing after deadly landfill collapse in Philippines
description: The landslide happened when a mountain of rubbish collapsed at a landfill site in the central Philippines.
content:

Rescue workers are racing to find dozens of people still missing following a landslide at a landfill site in the central… [+2145 chars]
de: Nach dem tödlichen Einsturz einer Mülldeponie auf den Philippinen suchen Retter nach Dutzenden Vermissten. Der Erdrutsch ereignete sich, als ein Müllberg auf einer Mülldeponie in den zentralen Philippinen einstürzte.
en: Rescuers race to find dozens missing after deadly landfill collapse in Philippines. The landslide happened when a mountain of rubbish collapsed at a landfill site in the central Philippines.
la: Rescuers genus ad inveniendum justos absentes post ruinam funestam landfill in Philippines. LAPSUS factum est cum mons rudera in situ landfill in media Philippinis collapsa est.
